Dialogue Text: Ah, the fated one has arrived. I have long awaited your presence.
WIll you be so kind as to let me on board? I sense an interesting structure nearby.
What do you mean by sense?
It's tall and nostalgic, enough to reflect one's life through it.
Maybe you might have heard of it. You know? One of those structures that never seem to stop flowing.
Hahaha! You react the same way just like that person I once knew.
"Stop with your weird antics and just call it by its name..."
Hm...? Name? What was it again? ...Anyways! It was elegant and  it's shaped like a house with some flowy things.
